00022 static int default_series_color[] = {
00023     V_BLUE,
00024     V_GREEN,
00025     V_RED,
00026     V_YELLOW,
00027     V_VIOLET,
00028     V_BROWN,
00029     V_ORANGE,
00030     V_PINK,
00031     V_BLACK,
00032     V_WHITE,
00033 };                                                // 10 default series colors
00034 
00035 enum {  DEFAULT_SERIES_COLOR_NUM = 10 };

00039     LEGEND_X_SPACING = 12,
00040     LEGEND_Y_SPACING = 2,
00041 };

00066 //-------- Begin of function GraphYear::init --------//
00100 void GraphYear::init(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2,
00101                      int seriesNum, int *dataNum,
00102                      void *dataArray, char dataTypeFlag,
00103                      int thisYearIndicator,
00104                      char *xLabel, char *yLabel,
00105                      char **legendArray, char transparentFlag,
00106                      char orientationFlag, char valueFlag,
00107                      int numFormat, int *seriesColor, int axisColor) {
00108     err_when(seriesNum > DEFAULT_SERIES_COLOR_NUM && !seriesColor);
00109     err_when(seriesNum <= 0);
00110 
00111     graph_width = x2 - x1 - 6;
00112 
00113     err_when(graph_width < 0);
00114 
00115     graph_x1 = x1;
00116     graph_y1 = y1;
00117     graph_x2 = x2;
00118     graph_y2 = y2;
00119     series_num = seriesNum;
00120     data_num = dataNum;
00121     data_array = dataArray;
00122     data_type_flag = dataTypeFlag;
00123 
00124     x_label = xLabel;
00125     y_label = yLabel;
00126     legend_array = legendArray;
00127 
00128     transparent_flag = transparentFlag;
00129     orientation_flag = orientationFlag;
00130     value_flag = valueFlag;
00131     num_format = numFormat;
00132 
00133     series_color = seriesColor ? seriesColor : default_series_color;
00134     axis_color = axisColor;
00135 
00136     init_flag = 1;
00137     this_year_indicator = thisYearIndicator;
00138     y_label_max_len = font_chartsm.text_width(MAX_LEN_LABEL);
00139     set_font(&font_chartsm);
00140 }
00141

00144 //-------- Begin of function GraphYear::deinit ------------//
00146 void GraphYear::deinit() {
00147     if (graph_bitmap) {
00148         mem_del(graph_bitmap);
00149         graph_bitmap = NULL;
00150     }
00151 
00152     init_flag = 0;
00153 }

00157 //-------- Begin of function GraphYear::set_font ------------//
00159 void GraphYear::set_font(Font *fontPtr) {
00160     if (!init_flag)
00161         return;
00162 
00163     font_ptr = fontPtr;
00164 
00165     calc_pos();
00166 }

00168 //------------- End of function GraphYear::set_font ---------//

00170 //-------- Begin of function GraphYear::calc_pos ------------//
00175 void GraphYear::calc_pos() {
00176     if (legend_array) {
00177         short textWidth = 0, textHeight = font_ptr->max_font_height;
00178 
00179         for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00180             if (font_ptr->text_width(legend_array[i]) > textWidth)
00181                 textWidth = font_ptr->text_width(legend_array[i]);
00182         }
00183 
00184         err_when(textWidth + LEGEND_X_SPACING * 2 > graph_width);
00185 
00186         legend_x_num = (graph_width - LEGEND_X_SPACING*2) / (textWidth + LEGEND_X_SPACING*2);
00187         legend_y_num = (series_num / legend_x_num) + ((series_num % legend_x_num) ? 1 : 0);
00188 
00189         graph_height = graph_y2 - graph_y1 - legend_y_num * (textHeight + LEGEND_Y_SPACING) - 6;
00190 
00191         err_when(graph_height <= 0);
00192 
00193         legend_width = (graph_width - LEGEND_X_SPACING*2) / legend_x_num;
00194         legend_height = textHeight + LEGEND_Y_SPACING;
00195     }
00196     else {
00197         legend_width = legend_height = legend_x_num = legend_y_num = 0;
00198         graph_height = graph_y2 - graph_y1 - 6;
00199     }
00200 
00201     short YLabelWidth = y_label ? (orientation_flag ? font_ptr->max_font_height : font_ptr->text_width(y_label)) : -COMMON_OFFSET;
00202     short XLabelHeight = x_label ? (font_ptr->max_font_height) : -COMMON_OFFSET;
00203     series_x1 = graph_x1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET*4 + YLabelWidth + y_label_max_len;
00204     series_y1 = graph_y1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET*6;
00205     series_x2 = graph_x2 - 4 - COMMON_OFFSET*16;
00206     series_y2 = graph_y1 + graph_height - COMMON_OFFSET*3 - (font_ptr->max_font_height);
00207 }
00208 
00209 //------------ End of function GraphYear::calc_pos ---------//

00211 //-------- Begin of function GraphYear::paint --------------//
00213 void GraphYear::paint() {
00214     if (transparent_flag) {
00215         user_interface.brighten(graph_x1+4, graph_y1+4, graph_x2-2, graph_y2-2);
00216         if (legend_array)
00217             draw_legend();
00218         draw_axis_label();
00219         graph_bitmap = vga_back.save_area(graph_x1+4, graph_y1+2, graph_x2-2, graph_y2-2, graph_bitmap);
00220     }
00221 
00222     //  paint_flag = 1;
00223     refresh();
00224 }
00225 
00226 //------------- End of function GraphYear::paint -----------//

00228 //-------- Begin of function GraphYear::refresh ------------//
00230 void GraphYear::refresh() {
00231     if (transparent_flag) {
00232         user_interface.rect(graph_x1, graph_y1, graph_x2, graph_y2, 1);
00233         vga_back.rest_area(graph_bitmap, 0, 0);
00234     }
00235     else {
00236         user_interface.bar(graph_x1, graph_y1, graph_x2, graph_y2);
00237         user_interface.panel(graph_x1+3, graph_y1+3, graph_x2-4, graph_y2-4);
00238     }
00239     if (legend_array)
00240         draw_legend();
00241     draw_scale();
00242     draw_series();
00243 
00244     //  if (!paint_flag)
00245     //          vga.blt_buf(graph_x1, graph_y1, graph_x2+2, graph_y2+2);
00246     //  else
00247     //          paint_flag = 0;
00248 }

00252 //---------- Begin of function GraphYear::draw_legend ------------//
00254 void GraphYear::draw_legend() {
00255     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00256         short legendX = graph_x1 + 4 + (i % legend_x_num) * legend_width + LEGEND_X_SPACING;
00257         short legendY = graph_y1 + 4 + graph_height + (i / legend_x_num) * legend_height;
00258         user_interface.bar( legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING+LEGEND_SIZE/2-1,
00259                             legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING+LEGEND_SIZE, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING+LEGEND_SIZE/2+1,
00260                             series_color[i] );
00261         font_ptr->put( legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING*2+LEGEND_SIZE, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING, legend_array[i] );
00262     }
00263 }
00264 
00265 //------------ End of function GraphYear::draw_legend ------------//

00267 //---------- Begin of function GraphYear::draw_axis_label --------//
00269 void GraphYear::draw_axis_label() {
00270     short textHeight = font_ptr->max_font_height;
00271 
00272     if (x_label) {
00273         font_ptr->center_put( series_x1, series_y2+COMMON_OFFSET*2+textHeight,
00274                               series_x2, graph_y1+graph_height-COMMON_OFFSET, x_label );
00275     }
00276 
00277     if (y_label) {
00278         short textWidth = font_ptr->text_width(y_label) + 1;
00279 
00280         if (orientation_flag) {
00281             short *fontBuf = (short *) sys.common_data_buf;
00282             err_when(textWidth * textHeight * sizeof(short) > COMMON_DATA_BUF_SIZE);
00283 
00284             for (int i = 0; i < textWidth * textHeight; i++)
00285                 *fontBuf++ = transparent_code_w;
00286 
00287             font_ptr->put_to_bufferW(fontBuf = (short *) sys.common_data_buf, textWidth * sizeof(short), 0, 0, y_label);
00288 
00289             short xStart = graph_x1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET * 2;
00290             short yStart = (series_y1 + series_y2 - textWidth) / 2;
00291 
00292             for (short x = 0; x < textHeight; x++) {
00293                 for (short y = textWidth - 1; y >= 0; y--, fontBuf++) {
00294                     if (*fontBuf != transparent_code_w)
00295                         *vga_back.buf_ptr(xStart+x, yStart+y) = *fontBuf;
00296                 }
00297             }
00298         }
00299         else {
00300             font_ptr->center_put( graph_x1+4+COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_y1,
00301                                   graph_x1+4+COMMON_OFFSET*2+textWidth, series_y2, y_label);
00302         }
00303     }
00304 }

00308 //---------- Begin of function GraphYear::find_scale -------------//
00310 void GraphYear::find_scale() {
00311     double data, maxVal = 0.0,minVal = 0.0;
00312 
00313     for (int i = 0; i < series_num * *data_num; i++) {
00314         switch (data_type_flag) {
00315         case DATA_DOUBLE:
00316             data = ((double*)data_array)[i];
00317             break;
00318         case DATA_FLOAT:
00319             data = double(((float*)data_array)[i]);
00320             break;
00321         case DATA_INT:
00322             data = double(((int*)data_array)[i]);
00323             break;
00324         case DATA_LONG:
00325             data = double(((long*)data_array)[i]);
00326             break;
00327         }
00328         if (data > maxVal)
00329             maxVal = data;
00330         if (data < minVal)
00331             minVal = data;
00332     }
00333     if (maxVal>0)
00334         max_scale = maxVal;
00335     else
00336         max_scale = 10;
00337 
00338     if (minVal<0)
00339         min_scale = minVal;
00340     else
00341         min_scale = 0;
00342 
00343 }
00344 
00345 //------------ End of function GraphYear::find_scale -------------//
00346 
00347 //---------- Begin of function GraphYear::draw_scale -------------//
00349 void GraphYear::draw_scale() {
00350     find_scale();
00351 
00352     //------ Draw y-axis -------//
00353     vga_back.bar(series_x1, series_y1-COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_x1+1, series_y2, axis_color);
00354 
00355     xAxisPos=(short)(series_y1+(series_y2-series_y1)*(max_scale)/(max_scale-min_scale));
00356 
00357     posScaleNum = (xAxisPos-series_y1-font_ptr->max_font_height) / (font_ptr->max_font_height*3/2);
00358     if(posScaleNum > 0)
00359         posScaleNum = short(pow(2,floor(log10(double(posScaleNum))/log10(2.0))));
00360     else
00361         posScaleNum = 0;
00362     negScaleNum = (series_y2-xAxisPos-font_ptr->max_font_height) / (font_ptr->max_font_height*3/2);
00363     if(negScaleNum > 0)
00364         negScaleNum = short(pow(2,ceil(log10(double(negScaleNum))/log10(2.0))));
00365     else
00366         negScaleNum = 0;
00367 
00368 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00369     if ( posScaleNum + negScaleNum <= 0) {
00370         posScaleNum = 1;
00371         negScaleNum = 0;
00372     }
00373 #endif
00374 
00375     short posScaleStep;
00376     short negScaleStep;
00377 
00378     if(posScaleNum<1) {
00379         posScaleStep = 0;
00380         posScaleInc = 0;
00381     }
00382     else {
00383         posScaleStep  = (xAxisPos-series_y1) / posScaleNum;
00384         posScaleInc   = max_scale / posScaleNum;
00385 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00386         if( data_type_flag==DATA_INT || data_type_flag==DATA_LONG )
00387             posScaleInc = ceil(posScaleInc);            // don't like integer type to have non-integral posScaleInc
00388 #endif
00389     }
00390 
00391     if(negScaleNum<1) {
00392         negScaleStep = 0;
00393         negScaleInc = 0;
00394     }
00395     else {
00396         negScaleStep = (series_y2-xAxisPos) / negScaleNum;
00397         negScaleInc   = -min_scale / negScaleNum;
00398 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00399         if( data_type_flag==DATA_INT || data_type_flag==DATA_LONG )
00400             negScaleInc = ceil(negScaleInc);            // don't like integer type to have non-integral negScaleInc
00401 #endif
00402     }
00403 
00404     if(posScaleNum+negScaleNum<1) {
00405         scaleStep = 0;
00406         scaleInc   = 0;
00407     }
00408     else {
00409         scaleStep = (short)((series_y2-series_y1)/(posScaleNum+negScaleNum));
00410         scaleInc = ((max_scale-min_scale)/(posScaleNum+negScaleNum));
00411 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00412         if( data_type_flag==DATA_INT || data_type_flag==DATA_LONG )
00413             scaleInc = max(posScaleInc, negScaleInc);
00414 #endif
00415     }
00416 
00417     double scaleValue;
00418 
00419     for (int i = -negScaleNum,ycheck=xAxisPos-i*scaleStep;
00420          ycheck>graph_y1;
00421          i++,ycheck-=scaleStep) {
00422         vga_back.bar(series_x1, ycheck, series_x1+COMMON_OFFSET*2, ycheck, axis_color);
00423 
00424         scaleValue = i*scaleInc;
00425 
00426         int y = ycheck-font_ptr->max_font_height/2;
00427 
00428         if( scaleValue==0 )                           // show the $0 higher so that it will not overlap with the x-axis
00429             y-=5;
00430 
00431         switch (data_type_flag) {
00432         case DATA_FLOAT:
00433         case DATA_DOUBLE:
00434             font_ptr->right_put(series_x1-COMMON_OFFSET, y, m.format(scaleValue,num_format));
00435             break;
00436         case DATA_INT:
00437         case DATA_LONG:
00438             font_ptr->right_put(series_x1-COMMON_OFFSET, y, m.format(long(scaleValue),num_format));
00439         }
00440     }
00441 
00442     //------ Draw x-axis -------//
00443 
00444     vga_back.bar(series_x1, xAxisPos-COMMON_OFFSET, series_x2+1, xAxisPos, axis_color);
00445 
00446     // show x-axis scale
00447 
00448     // At max, how much data points shown for each series
00449     int data_year_shown=8;
00450 
00451     // The scales within how much years should be shown
00452     int scale_year_shown=8;
00453 
00454     if(info.graph_year<data_year_shown)
00455         data_year_shown=info.graph_year;
00456 
00457     // the pointer points to the current financial year
00458     short maxLabelWidth = font_ptr->text_width(m.format(info.financial_year(), 16));
00459     double scaleYearRatio =1.0;
00460     x_axis_step = (series_x2-series_x1) / (scale_year_shown);
00461 
00462     short displayInc = 1;
00463     while (displayInc * x_axis_step < maxLabelWidth ) displayInc++;
00464 
00465     double printing_offset=1-finance.fiscal_year_start_month/12.0;
00466     printing_offset=0;                              // there should be no offset;
00467 
00468     int start_printing_year=(int)(info.financial_year()+
00469                                   ((this_year_indicator>=0)?this_year_indicator:0)
00470                                   +1-data_year_shown);
00471 
00472     //  double actual_end_year=(double)info.game_month/12.0+info.game_year+1;
00473     //  int show_end_year=(int)(actual_end_year-finance.fiscal_year_start_month/12.0);
00474     //  int show_start_year=show_end_year-year_shown+1;
00475 
00476     //------ Draw x-axis -------//
00477     for (i = 0; i < scale_year_shown ; i += displayInc) {
00478         vga_back.bar(
00479             (int)(series_x1+(printing_offset+i)*x_axis_step),
00480             xAxisPos-COMMON_OFFSET*2,
00481             (int)(series_x1+(printing_offset+i)*x_axis_step),
00482             xAxisPos, axis_color);
00483         font_ptr->center_put(
00484             (int)(series_x1+(printing_offset+i)*x_axis_step)-maxLabelWidth/2-COMMON_OFFSET,
00485             xAxisPos+COMMON_OFFSET,
00486             (int)(series_x1+(printing_offset+i)*x_axis_step)+maxLabelWidth/2+COMMON_OFFSET,
00487             xAxisPos+COMMON_OFFSET+font_ptr->max_font_height,
00488             m.format((int)(start_printing_year+i/scaleYearRatio), 16));
00489     }
00490 
00491     //---- Draw this year indicators ----//
00492     if((this_year_indicator>=0)&&(this_year_indicator<HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT))
00493         for(int j=series_y1;j<series_y2+COMMON_OFFSET;j+=8)
00494             vga_back.bar(
00495                 (int)(series_x1+(data_year_shown-this_year_indicator-1)*x_axis_step),
00496                 j,
00497                 (int)(series_x1+(data_year_shown-this_year_indicator-1)*x_axis_step),
00498                 j+4,
00499                 axis_color);
00500 }

00504 //---------- Begin of function GraphYear::draw_series ------------//
00506 void GraphYear::draw_series() {
00507     switch (data_type_flag) {
00508     case DATA_FLOAT: draw_series_float(); break;
00509     case DATA_DOUBLE: draw_series_double(); break;
00510     case DATA_INT: draw_series_int(); break;
00511     case DATA_LONG: draw_series_long(); break;
00512     }
00513 }
00514 
00515 //------------ End of function GraphYear::draw_series ------------//

00517 //---------- Begin of function GraphYear::draw_series_float ------------//
00519 void GraphYear::draw_series_float() {
00520     float *dataArray = (float *) data_array;
00521     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00522 
00523     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00524         dataArray-=info.graph_year;
00525         dataArray+=HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
00526         prevX = series_x1+3;
00527         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc) ;
00528 
00529         dataArray++;
00530         vga_back.thick_line(prevX-1, prevY, prevX+1, prevY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00531 
00532         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_year; j++) {
00533             currX = series_x1 + j * x_axis_step;
00534             currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc) ;
00535 
00536             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00537 
00538             prevX = currX;
00539             prevY = currY;
00540             dataArray++;
00541         }
00542 
00543         if (value_flag)
00544             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-(((i/2)==0)?1:0)*font_news.max_font_height , DATA_FLOAT);
00545     }
00546 }
00547 
00548 //------------ End of function GraphYear::draw_series_float ------------//
00549 
00550 //---------- Begin of function GraphYear::draw_series_double ------------//
00552 void GraphYear::draw_series_double() {
00553     double *dataArray = (double *) data_array;
00554     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00555 
00556     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00557         dataArray-=info.graph_year;
00558         dataArray+=HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
00559         prevX = series_x1+3;
00560         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * (double)scaleStep/scaleInc);
00561 
00562         dataArray++;
00563         vga_back.thick_line(prevX-1, prevY, prevX+1, prevY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00564 
00565         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_year; j++) {
00566             currX = series_x1 + j * x_axis_step;
00567             currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * (double)scaleStep/scaleInc);
00568 
00569             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00570 
00571             prevX = currX;
00572             prevY = currY;
00573             dataArray++;
00574         }
00575 
00576         if (value_flag)
00577             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-(((i/2)==0)?1:0)*font_news.max_font_height, DATA_DOUBLE);
00578     }
00579 }

00616 //---------- Begin of function GraphYear::draw_series_long ------------//
00618 void GraphYear::draw_series_long() {
00619     long *dataArray = (long *) data_array;
00620     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00621 
00622     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00623         dataArray-=info.graph_year;
00624         dataArray+=HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
00625         prevX = series_x1+3;
00626         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00627 
00628         dataArray++;
00629         vga_back.thick_line(prevX-1, prevY, prevX+1, prevY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00630 
00631         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_year; j++) {
00632             currX = series_x1 + j * x_axis_step;
00633             currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00634 
00635             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00636 
00637             prevX = currX;
00638             prevY = currY;
00639             dataArray++;
00640         }
00641 
00642         if (value_flag)
00643             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-(((i/2)==0)?1:0)*font_news.max_font_height, DATA_LONG);
00644     }
00645 }

00658     case DATA_INT:

00660     case DATA_LONG:
00661         valueString = m.format(*((long *) value), num_format); break;

00664     short textHeight = font_news.max_font_height;
00665     short textWidth = font_news.text_width(valueString) + 1;

00671       *bitmap++ = textHeight;
00672
